text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It was a tough high-pace for the Horse Girls running in the 
front, it was a tough battle, but only one of them, Narita Brian, 
escaped and took the victory!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
What's more, look at the time, not only beating the “SatsukiShou” 
record, but Nakayama's 2000m course record!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
What an overwhelming run! The loud cheers 
from the stands are not stopping!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: W-What is with that straight line stretching!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Even though you are a G1, you're treating other racers like 
children!? Just how strong are you, Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
3 lengths difference of overwhelming victory, plus 
course record. Even after achieving all that in a race, 
you still don't have the face of a runner…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Brian, you're such a selfish little sister.
The classic race, an overwhelming victory on the grand stageー

This was the trigger that got her the 
title of “The strongest Horse Girl”.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Fu…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Ah!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Woah, Brian is amazing… She's been updating 
her time many times since a while ago.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Even though she did so much running at the “SatsukiShou”, she 
still seems to be gaining strength.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Look at that, the guys who are crazy around 
you are also choking their mouths.

It's something that goes beyond our expectations every time she 
runs. I've had to rework my training menu multiple times already.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Phew.

That was a good run, Brian. It seems that your running is 
becoming more and more steady .

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Running with a low center of gravity, right? When we scouted 
Brian, Trainer and I created this tactic together.

I only gave some advice, but it was Brian who actually did it. I 
was really surprised when I saw that run.

I only gave some advice, but it was Brian who actually did it. I 
was really surprised when I saw that run.
Well, then let's finish with 1 more run at the end.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's over… If so, I will run seriously. Please measure my time.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huh…? So until now you haven't been serious!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Trainer-san, it seems we need to review the training menu again.
Sounds like it…

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, Brian-san! I would like to interview you!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ahh, What is it!? In the middle of training, you're such a jerk!!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
I'm fully aware it's rude, but I can't catch you at all, so I 
came at the training time and the car…!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: If you don't have a choice, how about you interview me instead?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Golshi and Trainer, I'll leave the rest 
to you. I'll continue running.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Ahh～, Please wait! At least one word!!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
The “SatsukiShou” was a stunning victory, but 
is your goal ahead after all, to become the 5th 
“Triple Crown Horse Girl” in history?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …That is just a “Passing Point”.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: …Passing Point? I-In what sense do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It means what it is.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
When you win the triple crown, your 
desire for racing doesn't subside…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I knew you would be here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
The school is like a mountain of reporters 
aiming for you at the end of training.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Big-sister…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In the “SatsukiShou” if you follow such a high-pace flow, it is 
natural that you run out of power in the last straight line.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In spite of that, you got along with the development 
and while all around you ran out of power, you were 
the only person who escaped and won.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
If you are shown such a thing, it is natural 
that the world is in uproar.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…I didn't really intend to do anything special. Even that pace 
didn't really feel that fast.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I know very well that there are Horse Girls who run faster.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…Even when you make this much uproar in the world in a 
spectacular race, you still don't show any sign of being filled .

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wonder when the day will come when it will be filled.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…When you return you should use the back 
gate, there is no reporters there.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're in a good team, your results prove it. I'll be sure to see 
what you can do in the future.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
When will the day come when it will be filled… That's what 
big-sister should know the most, right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It is when I overtake your back.
